concept_hook: Sultry chanteuse whose hypnotic voice seduces foes into self-inflicted submission.
narrative_role: Charismatic heel who revels in psychological torment but spares those who submit.

concept_hook: Voodoo priestess summoning wrathful spirits to possess and shatter enemy wills.
narrative_role: Tormented mystic who loathes her addictive power yet craves its thrill.
media_archetype_inspiration: Voodoo priestess from Live and Let Die

concept_hook: Stealthy toxin specialist delivering paralytics via hidden needles and tainted kisses.
narrative_role: Pragmatic survivor numb to suffering but protective of the vulnerable.

concept_hook: Teenage martial prodigy outsmarting bruisers with surgical precision strikes.
narrative_role: Innocent riser whose thrill for victory edges into obsession.

concept_hook: Possessed marionette twisting foes with razor wires and contortionist snaps.
narrative_role: Childlike killer giggling through pain while fearing her own fragility.

concept_hook: Tribal spearwoman trapping prey in brutal ambushes amid simulated jungles.
narrative_role: Honorable predator who hunts for glory but weeps for the fallen.

concept_hook: Ancestral warlord channeling ghostly legions to crush rebellions.
narrative_role: Lone sovereign seeking a successor amid her growing isolation.
media_archetype_inspiration: Sun Shang Xiang from Dynasty Warriors

concept_hook: Unstable cyborg berserker overloading enhancements to tear through defenses.
narrative_role: Furious lab reject punishing creators through glorious, risky rampages.
media_archetype_inspiration: Motoko Kusanagi from Ghost in the Shell
